text: Sochi Cup is a men's one-day cycle race which takes place in Sochi, Russia and was rated by the UCI as 1.2http://www.procyclingstats.com/race/Sochi_Cup_2015 and forms part of the UCI Europe Tour.http://www.procyclingstats.com/races.php?c=1&year;=2014&circuit;=13 ==Winners== ==References== Category:Cycle races in Russia Category:Sport in Sochi
title: Sochi Cup
